name: Godotling Life
description:
A fun mini-game duck raising game! Fight in bullet hell flights and typing clashes to train your duck to be the next emperor!

This is a prototype duck-life clone for the Cypress Ranch Game Jam. As of now, 2 of the 3 mini games are finished and the final conquest is still buggy.

Credits
Title and home music created by https://www.youtube.com/@LuKremBo
Praying mantis created by  https://www.youtube.com/@teknoaxe
Satanic panic music created by https://www.youtube.com/@JacobLizotte
